description: React component for client-side handling of a Connector detail page, including data fetching, editing, and saving connector information.

methods.name: ConnectorClient
methods.description: React component providing UI for viewing and editing connector details using hooks for state and side-effects.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Async function to fetch connector data by ID and set component state.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Async function to submit updated connector data to API and refresh state.
